name: Megaman X Remake
description:
Megaman X Remake project made for the "Game Development" class at the University of La Sabana.

This remake contains one level showing the gameplay mechanics developed during the semester.

Controls;

  • W A S D to move.
  • Spacebar to jump.
  • Z to fire.

Made in Unity using  assets provided by the teacher and found for free on the internet. 

Note: You may need to adjust your browser's zoom level for the game to fit your screen.
